jobInfo.postDescription:
职位综述：
IT intern's supports the IT team to maintain hardware, software and other systems, help solve problems and provide technical support
IT实习生主要的工作内容是支持IT团队维护硬件，软件和其他系统、协助解决问题并提供技术支持等
岗位职责：
•	Support the IT team by maintaining hardware, software, and systems
支持IT团队，维护硬件、软件和系统
•	Assist with troubleshooting issues and provide technical support
协助问题定位，并提供技术支持
•	Organize and maintain IT resources
组织和维护IT资源
•	Using PDQ Deploy and Inventory and PowerShell script, your solution will be able to automate our software installation process in China. A list of 10 different tools will be provided, all of them need to able to be install remotely, the time frame for that goal is 3 months
能够使用PDQ Deploy、Inventory和PowerShell脚本，提供解决方案，实现中国的软件安装过程自动化。我们将提供一张列有10种不同工具的列表，其中所有工具都需要实现远程安装，且需要在3个月期限之内达到该目标

任职资格：
•	Good English language skill in writing, reading and speaking
良好的英语听说读写能力
•	Familiar with any scripting language
熟悉所有脚本语言
•	Long term internship from 3 month to 6 month ideally
3个月到6个月的长期实习最为理想
•	Someone with scripting experience/studies is a plus and if its powershell he's the perfect candidate. His project will be to automate clients tools installation/update
具有脚本编写/学习经验优先，具有PowerShell脚本经验最佳。实习项目为实现客户端工具的安装/更新自动化。
•	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
出色的分析和解决问题的能力
•	Ability to work well in teams
团队合作能力
•	Strong work ethic and attention to detail
强烈的职业道德和对细节的关注

Keywords International is dedicated to following a well established Equal Opportunities Policy. We endeavour to create a workplace which provides for equal opportunities for all employees and potential employees.
Keywords International致力于遵循良好的平等机会政策。我们努力创造一个为所有员工和潜在员工提供平等机会的工作场所。
Dear candidates, by sending your CV you consent Keywords International Ltd to collect, process and use your personal data in accordance to the privacy policy. 
https://www.keywordsstudios.com/privacy-policy/
致候选人，通过发送您的简历，意味着您同意熠文国际有限公司将根据隐私政策，收集，处理和使用您的个人数据。https://www.keywordsstudios.com/privacy-policy/
jobInfo.address: 成都武侯区富顿中心(金履二路)D座5楼

brandComInfo.introduce: 锐核软件（上海）有限公司是一家设立在上海的外包工作室，于2017年5月正式加入Keywords集团，现名为熠文（上海）信息技术有限公司成都分公司。我们向游戏，电视和电影作品提供高质量低成本的外包服务，包括概念设计，3D角色，场景等模型的制作，动画，引擎集成以及市场推广宣传材料。
